lead_paragraph: Thousands of families have fled the Porter Ranch neighborhood, and many say they are not sure they will return.

headline.print_headline: Gas Leak in Los Angeles Has Residents Looking Warily Toward Flint
headline.main: Gas Leak in Los Angeles Has Residents Looking Warily Toward Flint

snippet: Thousands of families have fled the Porter Ranch neighborhood, and many say they are not sure they will return.
abstract: Many residents of Los Angeles neighborhood of Porter Ranch refuse to return to their homes following long-term natural gas leak, despite city's insistence air is safe; many have turned to attorneys for help, some of whom are formulating lawsuits against city and Southern California Gas Company; current degree of public distrust seen in LA may well stem from events in Flint, Mich, city grappling with deadly results of lead contamination in drinking water, long ignored by officials.
